title: high *MS*  only in league of legends
body:
i just joined a tournament and oh look at this i've got 700 ms, right after that i went to play rainbow six siege and i had 90 ms???!?! 
how can i fix this ms thing because its so annoying when i enter games and i get 300+ms so its impossible to play. Please help me i wanna kill myself

replies.body: I'm curious if those ping spikes were related to the specific servers those tournaments were being held on. If you could, grab the network logs from that match where you had 700 ping and let this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan them. Post a screenshot of what it gives you back here so I can take a look!
